title: corrupted files
body: when my game is loading i et bug splat and when i start the game again i get corrupted files and even when i fixed it few days later i get the same problem so i even instaled my windows again and uninstalled lol and after 2 days i get the same problem, so at this point i dont know whats going with this

replies.body:
It sounds like there may be some issues going on with your hardware (disk). Our [Bugsplat guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974-Bug-Splat-and-Game-Crashes) covers the most common solutions for this, so I recommend giving those steps a go.

Let me know if they helped.
